title: African Burial Ground National Monument: Field Trips
body: Field Trips       Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Exploring the African Burial Ground   A 90 minute ranger led tour explores our visitor center and memorial and includes a film showing    Type:Field Trips Grade level:Fourth Grade-Adult Education (general) Subjects:African American History and Culture, Archaeology, Civic Engagement, Civil Rights Movement, Colonial History, History
